hematoma_side.Description: Side of the brain on which the hematoma is at the time of the diagnosis

surgery.Description: Boolean to indicate if surgery was performed after the diagnosis

recurrence.Description: Boolean to indicate if a new bleeding occurred during the follow-up

session_label.Description: Label of the session found based on the dates of diagnosis and surgery

Levels.prediag: Session before any cSDH was found. Can be considered as a pseudo-healthy counterpart
Levels.diag: Session at the time of the diagnosis. Most of the time, this is where the hematoma is the largest
Levels.postop: Session just after surgery. Water can be visible in the brain CT
Levels.followup: Session obtained after diagnosis (and eventually surgery). A hematoma may or not be visible.

filename.Description: path to the NifTi file from this folder

original_series.Description: series of the image in the XNAT data set. For annotation files, correspond to the series of the annotated image

original_seg_filename.Description: for annotation files only, correspond to the filename in the original XNAT data set.

interpolation.Description: boolean to state if the image is original if it has been resized.
